mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rn, tt.*from (select * from blogboardtable order by blogboardtable_seq desc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
mapper.insert: insert into blogboardtable(blogboardtable_seq, nickname, subject, content, mainimage, logtime, publicoption) values(blogboardtable_seq.nextval, #{nickname }, #{subject }, #{content},#{backgroundImg } ,sysdate,#{publicoption })
